## Global Business Services (GBS), once focused on cost reduction, are now at the forefront of technological innovation, driving digital transformation and reshaping global value chains. As GBS evolves, the focus is shifting from simple cost-innovation dynamics to resilience, digital sovereignty, and "shoring" strategies. In particular, the rise of AI and automation is transforming GBS operations, enabling more efficient processes and new service offerings. Especially for middle powers such as Malaysia and Poland, multinational corporations, doing GBS right can reap significant benefits in terms of competitiveness and economic growth. 

::: {.button}
[Read Liao's analysis](foundation-frontiers/posts/2024/02/19/what-is-data-science.qmd)

## Leading MNCs are now treating Generative AI as the primary engine to evolve GBS from a "back-office cost center" into a "strategic intelligence hub." This shift is driven by the transformative potential of Generative AI to enhance decision-making, automate complex processes, and create new value propositions. By leveraging Generative AI, GBS can move beyond traditional cost-saving roles to become a critical driver of innovation and competitive advantage in the global business landscape.
